title: USA Patriot Act Faces Midnight Expiration Deadline
teaser: At midnight, three counterterrorism provisions in the USA Patriot Act expire â€” unless the Senate passes a bill already approved by the House. NPR's David Welna talks with NPR's Linda Wertheimer about what could be a dramatic day.
